name: exit
description:
Used to: Abort the processing of the currently executing CFML custom tag, exit the template
within the currently executing CFML custom tag and re-execute a section of code within the currently
executing CFML custom tag

params.name: method
params.description:
Allowed values:

* **exittag**: aborts processing of currently executing tag
* **exittemplate**: exits page of currently executing tag
* **loop**: reexecutes body of currently executing tag
